Name: Line Simulator
About the game: Line Simulator is a quirky virtual reality game where you can create bizarre ways to get yourself to the front of the line in five foolery-filled levels! Meet zany characters, complete mini-quests, and discover the secrets of the duck while fulfilling your line-jumping fantasies. Throw objects, pour drinks, or even steal from your fellow queuers to jump to the front of the line. Designed with an easy-to-navigate interface for no-stress, casual gaming experience! Explore 5 environments with over hundreds of interactable objects per level!
